title: Damage Mitigation - Post-game Screen
body:
There are things in the post-game screen that only apply specifically, such as Largest Critical Strike which allows those AD Damage champs to compare themselves against one another. 

There's Healing Done which allows some supports to weigh themselves up against their opponents and allies to see who healed the most. Although when playing someone such as Janna {{champion:40}} , Lux {{champion:99}}  and Orianna {{champion:61}}  , you get no recognition for all of the damage you mitigated with your shields. The same though could be said about Alistar {{champion:12}}  and Garen {{champion:86}}  with their 'Reduce Damage' effects which mitigates damage to an extent. Recording this is just a way to show your contribution to the team in another way to help get a little more recognition.
